quote: MS-13 is a prime target. They are bad people. And we’ve gotten many of them out already.  You know, we’re pretty much at the 50 percent mark.
quotePlain: MS-13 is a prime target. They are bad people. And we’ve gotten many of them out already.  You know, we’re pretty much at the 50 percent mark.
name: Donald Trump

checks.quote:
For Trump to claim that half of the Ms-13 gang members have been deported would mean that his administration is responsible for about 5,000 removals of MS-13 members.

Here’s why that is not possible: Danielle Bennett, a spokeswoman for the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, told us in an email for our earlier story that so far in fiscal year 2017 — from Oct. 1, 2016, to June 4, 2017 — ICE has removed 2,798 gang members. That includes all gang members, not just MS-13 members. For perspective, the FBI says there are about 33,000 street gangs with about 1.4 million members.
checks.short: Actually, the number is in the hundreds.
checks.quotePlain:
For Trump to claim that half of the Ms-13 gang members have been deported would mean that his administration is responsible for about 5,000 removals of MS-13 members.
Here’s why that is not possible: Danielle Bennett, a spokeswoman for the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, told us in an email for our earlier story that so far in fiscal year 2017 — from Oct. 1, 2016, to June 4, 2017 — ICE has removed 2,798 gang members. That includes all gang members, not just MS-13 members. For perspective, the FBI says there are about 33,000 street gangs with about 1.4 million members.
checks.shortPlain: Actually, the number is in the hundreds.

claims.title: half of MS-13 deported
claims.negative: half of MS-13 has not been deported
claims.negativePlain: half of MS-13 has not been deported
claims.truth: The real number is in the hundreds, of approximately 10,000 members.
claims.truthPlain: The real number is in the hundreds, of approximately 10,000 members.
